growthexperiments-homepage-specialpage-s: This is {{GENDER:$1|your}} homepage, where you can find help with editing, get ideas of what to work on, and see the impact of your edits.
growthexperiments-homepage-pt-link: Default to newcomer homepage from username link in personal tools
growthexperiments-homepage-userpage-body: Practice editing while building your public profile.
Continue working on your public profile.
growthexperiments-homepage-email-text-un: Check {{GENDER:$1|your}} email for a confirmation link, or send a new link.
growthexperiments-homepage-email-text-co: {{GENDER:$1|Your}} email has been confirmed. You can change your email settings in Preferences.
growthexperiments-homepage-impact-subhea: People are viewing the articles {{GENDER:$1|you}} edited!
{{GENDER:$1|You}} have not yet edited any articles.
This area will show the impact of {{GENDER:$1|your}} edits.
growthexperiments-homepage-impact-contri: $1 {{PLURAL:$1|edit|edits}} to other kinds of pages (see all)
tag-help_module_question-description: Edit made from the homepage help module's post a question feature
tag-mentorship_module_question-descripti: Edit made from the homepage mentorship module's post a question feature
growthexperiments-homepage-mentorship-in: This {{GENDER:$1|experienced user}} knows you're new and can help {{GENDER:$2|you}} with editing.
growthexperiments-homepage-mentorship-qu: When you ask a question, it gets posted publicly under {{GENDER:$2|your}} username, "$2", to $3, which is where {{GENDER:$1|they}} can find and respond to your question.
growthexperiments-homepage-mentorship-co: {{GENDER:$2|Your}} question is now on your {{GENDER:$1|mentor's}} talk page, which is where they will answer it as soon as they can.
growthexperiments-homepage-mentorship-vi: View {{GENDER:$2|your}} question on your {{GENDER:$1|mentor's}} talk page.
growthexperiments-homepage-tutorial-subh: Follow a quick tutorial to learn how to edit Wikipedia
